title: After Windows 10 Update  - Lol stop working
body:
Hello !

I have a big problem . Few days ago i update my computer to windows 10 .Until this update LOL works fine . After that when i try to open LOL and i click "play" button . nothing happends .

First i try to reinstall LOL - same problem
Secound i try to delete RADS and other folders - Same
Third i make all updates from windows . Also i try to make that settings on Internet Explorer.

Here  my rads log  maybe this will help:

replies.body:
The anniversary updates that rolled out about a week ago are causing some issues for players running Windows 10. I recommend [rolling those updates back or uninstalling them](http://www.howtogeek.com/235474/how-to-roll-back-builds-and-uninstall-updates-on-windows-10/) to see if it resolves this for you.

Let me know if it did.
Nothing happend . I roll back all updates :( .

Sorry to hear that. So another possibility here is that your client isn't able to establish a connection to server to launch you to login. This can be caused by problematic local network settings or ISP routing issues. I strongly recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address the most common solutions. 

Let me know if anything changes after taking those steps.

At this point, I recommend reaching out to our tech team through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). If you run a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) and attach them to your request, you'll be giving our specialists the context necessary to help you find a permanent solution.

If you have any questions, let me know.

Client bug splats when trying to enter game, and hard locks computer when finally in game.

Can confirm rolling back did NOT work.

Can confirm reinstalling League of Legends did NOT work.

EDIT: To anyone having the same issue as me, running the game in windowed mode solved my problem. 
Since you can only access your settings in game, you will have to enable windowed mode in the .config file (located in C:/Riot Games/League/Config) by changing the WindowedMode value to 1 (or 2 for borderless windowed).

I'm having the same issue
past two days

it worked fine previously last week
 Once I get into the game it hard freezes
rare occasion after I reboot my computer if the game is still happening. I am able to play

 I can play but once the game is over
it freezes before its says "victory" or "defeat"

my computer is 2 months old
I'm concerned for my hardware if I am having to hard reboot becuz of this game

this has happened to me 90% of the time last two days
Havin the same issue did every method shown fixin but none of them worked. Got the launcher to work but goin in-game gettin those same msg. T.T Keep crashing might be the end of LOL for me.

ive reinstalled and done repairs
and even tried downloading .Net Framework
